channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Whole road needs resurfacing, 9th February
item.description:
Too many potholes that keep opening up after many patches. The whole road needs resurfacing! It’s especially lethal/dangerous to motorbike riders.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Green Street, Brockworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole in centre of carriageway, 9th February
item.description:

item.title: Several potholes along Ashwood Way, 9th February
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ashwood Way, Gloucester
